lyrics:
Chorus:

I wait for a day
A sweet gentle sway
Rocks your love right my way
Oh you send me swingin'
You send me swingin'
Oh you send me swingin'

Verse:

I never thought I'd really find
Someone so beautiful and kind
Oh what you've done to me
It's just the little things you do
That's got me crazy over you
And it's getting stronger

Bridge

When I'm with you
1 I fall deeper in love
Swingin
This feelin is the one thing my heart is sure of
So I'll


Chorus


Verse:

Oh
Just thinkin 'bout you
And all the things that we could do
Together as one

If only you could see
How sweet your love is to me
So heavenly

Bridge

No other way
To say just how I feel for you
Swingin'
Everyday that passes
My heart grows closer to you

Chorus

Adlib

Bridge

When I'm with you I fall deeper in love
This feelin is the one thing my heart is sure of
So I'll...

Chorus
